result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

request to Judge Falstad from S.J.H. - approved 7/11/16

Clerk: Kimberly.
Case Called: 2:11pm
INCLUDES 15CF794, 15CF873, 15CM917, 15CM1382, 15CM1581, 16CF185
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo. Deft appears with Atty Kat Jackan.
Date and time set for preliminary hearing in 16CF185 & pleas in all six files

COURT addresses Atty Jackan on conflict of interest in 16CF185 due to last hearing on 03/25/16, Atty Jackan stated a new attoreny would have to be appointed
Atty Jackan states she spoke to her supervisior and there will not be conflict of interest on new file- 16CF185
Deft would like to proceed today with Atty Jackan representing him

Preliminary hearing in 16CF185:
Waiver of  Prelim filed.  
Court ques. Deft re: Waiver.   
ourt finds Waiver freely & vol. made, finds probable cause & binds Deft over for Trial.  
Information filed. Reading Waived.
 
Plea's in all:
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
15CF794:
Ct. 2 Possess Drug Paraphernalia to manufacture, compound, convert, produce, or store methamphetamine >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Possess Drug Paraphernalia >> D&RI
Ct. 4 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
15CF873:
Ct. 1 Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine (<=3g) >> D&RI
Ct. 4  Possess Drug Paraphernalia to manufacture, compound, convert, produce, or store methamphetamine >> D&RI
Ct. 5 Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription >> D&RI
Ct. 6 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
Ct. 7 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
Ct. 8 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
15CM917:
Ct. 1 Criminal Trespass to Dwelling >> D&RI
15CM1382:
Ct. 1 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
15CM1581:
Ct. 1 Possession of THC >> D&RI
Ct. 2 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
16CF185:
Ct. 2 Bail Jumping- Felony >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Bail Jumping- Felony >> D&RI
COURT grants above

PLEA:
15CF794:
Ct. 1 Maintain Drug Trafficking Place >> NO CONTEST
15CF873:
Ct. 2 Maintain Drug Trafficking Place >> NO CONTEST
Ct. 3 Bail Jumping- Felony >> NO CONTEST
16CF185:
Ct. 1 Possession of Methamphetamine >> NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: w/ hold sentencing. 4 years probation, concurrent with each other. CONDITIONS: ONLY IN 15CF873 Ct. 2- Serve 9 months MCJ. Jail may be with huber release for work, work search, or treatment if meets jail criteria; 12 days credit granted. CONDITIONS of all: Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent. Complete AODA assessment with follow through and/or follow through from Koinonia Treatment center. Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol, only take prescriped medications as recommended. Maintain GFE in full time employment/schooling/combination of two. Pay CC. Pay DNA sample and surcharge. All cash bonds posted be returned to poster. If revoked, 15CF794- 2 days credit granted & 16CF185- 9 days credit granted. 

Adj: 2:34pm
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 4, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on April 6, 2016 at 02:10 pm.
